mapper.insert: insert into ORDER_DETAIL ( ORDERS_ID, GOODS_ID, ORDERS_CODE, ACNT_ID, ORDERS_QY, CREATE_DE ) values ( #{orderId}, #{goodsId}, (select ORDERS_CODE from ORDERS where ORDERS_ID = #{orderId}), #{accountId}, #{quantity}, now() )
mapper.select: select od.GOODS_ID as goodsId, od.ORDERS_QY as quantity, goods.GOODS_CODE as goodsCode from ORDER_DETAIL od join GOODS goods on od.GOODS_ID = goods.GOODS_ID where ORDERS_CODE = #{orderCode};
